Our approach blends artistic vision with strategic marketing, creating content that doesn't just showcase properties but evokes the essence of luxury hospitality.

## Technical Architecture

### Framework & Core Technologies

- **Next.js:** 16.1.1 (App Router, Server Components, Metadata API)
- **React:** 19.2.3 (Client Components, Hooks)
- **TypeScript:** Latest (strict mode enabled)
- **Tailwind CSS:** 4.1.18 (utility-first styling with custom design tokens)
- **Deployment:** Vercel (edge functions, automatic deployments)

### Backend & Services

- **Supabase:** 2.90.1 (PostgreSQL database, authentication, storage, row-level security)
- **Cloudinary:** Image CDN with auto-optimization (f_auto, q_auto parameters)
- **Resend:** 6.7.0 (email service for contact forms)
- **Google Tag Manager:** Analytics and tracking
- **Ahrefs Analytics:** SEO monitoring

### Key Features

- **Internationalization:** next-intl 4.7.0 (Spanish default, English secondary)
- **Rich Text Editing:** TipTap 3.15.3 (blog content management)
- **Animations:** Framer Motion 11.15.0 (page transitions, component reveals)
- **SEO:** Schema.org structured data (Organization, LocalBusiness, Service, Breadcrumbs)
- **Security:** Rate limiting, honeypot protection, environment variables for secrets
- **Performance:** Next.js Image optimization, lazy loading, dynamic imports, preconnect hints

### Design System

**Color Palette:**
- Primary Accent: #FC7CA4 (Sassy Pink)
- Gold Accent: #D4AF37 (Luxury Gold)
- Backgrounds: White (#FFFFFF), Warm Off-White (#FAFAF8)
- Text: Charcoal (#333333), Soft Gray (#666666)

**Typography:**
- System font stack with fallbacks for optimal performance
- Font optimization enabled in Next.js config

**Visual Effects:**
- Noise overlay texture (0.04 opacity) for film grain aesthetic

## Site Structure & Pages

### Public Pages

- **/** - Homepage with hero carousel/slideshow, services overview, blog preview, portfolio grid, contact form
- **/blog** - Blog listing with category filters, search, pagination
- **/blog/[slug]** - Individual blog posts with rich text content, images, SEO metadata
- **/services** - "Alchemist's Menu" themed service showcase with asymmetrical grid layout
- **/portfolio** - Portfolio grid with client work, category filters
- **/faq** - Frequently asked questions with schema markup
- **/login** - "Sassy Vault" authentication portal

### Protected Pages (Admin)

- **/dashboard** - "Alchemy Dashboard" with tabbed interface
  - **Posts Tab:** Blog post creation and management with TipTap editor
  - **Portfolio Tab:** Client work management with Cloudinary integration
  - **Assets Tab:** Cloudinary asset browser with folder navigation
  - **Style Tab:** Site-wide style settings (colors, hero configuration)

### API Endpoints

#### Content Management
- `POST /api/posts` - Create blog post (authenticated)
- `GET /api/posts` - List blog posts (public, supports language filter)
- `PUT /api/posts` - Update blog post (authenticated)
- `DELETE /api/posts` - Delete blog post (authenticated)

#### Lead Generation
- `POST /api/leads` - Submit contact form (rate-limited, honeypot protected)
  - Fields: name, email, message, phone (optional)
  - Sends email via Resend to contacto@sassystudio.com.mx
  - Returns 200 on success, 429 on rate limit

#### Asset Management
- `POST /api/cloudinary/signature` - Generate upload signature (authenticated)
- `GET /api/cloudinary/folders` - List Cloudinary folder structure (authenticated)
- `GET /api/cloudinary/asset` - Fetch asset by public_id (authenticated)
- `GET /api/assets` - Legacy asset endpoint (may be deprecated)

#### SEO & Discovery
- `GET /api/sitemap.xml` - Dynamic XML sitemap generation
- `GET /api/image-sitemap` - Image sitemap for search engines
- `GET /sitemap.ts` - Next.js app router sitemap configuration

## Content Types & Data Models

### Blog Post (Post)
```typescript
{
  id: string;              // UUID
  slug: string;            // URL-friendly identifier
  title: string;           // Post title
  content: string;         // Rich text HTML (TipTap)
  image?: string;          // Cloudinary URL
  category?: string;       // Blog category
  excerpt?: string;        // SEO description
  published: boolean;      // Visibility flag
  language: 'es' | 'en';   // Content language
  created_at: timestamp;
  updated_at: timestamp;
}
```

### Portfolio Item (PortfolioItem)
```typescript
{
  id: string;              // UUID
  clientName: string;      // Client/project name
  category: string;        // Service category
  imageUrl: string;        // Cloudinary URL
  description?: string;    // Project description
  created_at: timestamp;
}
```

### Asset (Cloudinary Metadata)
```typescript
{
  public_id: string;       // Cloudinary identifier
  url: string;             // Delivery URL
  secure_url: string;      // HTTPS URL
  format: string;          // File format (jpg, png, webp)
  width: number;
  height: number;
  folder?: string;         // Cloudinary folder path
}
```

### Site Settings (SiteSettings)
```typescript
{
  colors: {
    accent?: string;       // Primary brand color
  };
  heroMode?: 'carousel' | 'slideshow';
  heroImages?: string[];   // Array of Cloudinary URLs
}
```

### Contact Lead (Lead Submission)
```typescript
{
  name: string;            // Required
  email: string;           // Required, validated
  message: string;         // Required
  phone?: string;          // Optional
  companyWebsite?: string; // Honeypot field (must be empty)
}
```

## Authentication & Security

### Authentication
- **Provider:** Supabase Auth
- **Protected Routes:** /dashboard/* (requires session)
- **Session Management:** Cookie-based with httpOnly flag
- **Login Portal:** /login (branded as "Sassy Vault")

### Security Measures
- **Rate Limiting:** 5 requests per 60 seconds on /api/leads
- **Honeypot Protection:** companyWebsite field in contact form (must be empty)
- **Environment Variables:** All API keys and secrets in .env.local
- **Row-Level Security:** Supabase RLS policies on database tables
- **CORS:** Configured for sassystudio.com.mx domain
- **Input Validation:** Zod schemas on all API endpoints

## Integration & Development Notes

### Image Optimization
- All images served via Cloudinary with automatic format conversion (WebP/AVIF)
- Standard parameters: `f_auto,q_auto` for optimal delivery
- Next.js Image component used throughout for lazy loading and responsive sizing
- Priority loading on hero images, lazy loading on below-fold content

### Performance Optimization
- Google Tag Manager loaded with `afterInteractive` strategy (non-blocking)
- Preconnect hints for res.cloudinary.com and analytics.ahrefs.com
- Dynamic imports for hero components (HeroCarousel, HeroSlideshow)
- requestIdleCallback for non-critical localStorage reads and blog fetches
- Font optimization enabled in Next.js config

### SEO Best Practices
- One H1 per page (semantic hierarchy enforced)
- LocalBusiness schema with Mexico City geo coordinates
- Breadcrumb navigation with schema markup
- Metadata API for per-page OpenGraph and Twitter cards
- Canonical URLs with hreflang alternates
- Internal linking strategy with contextual anchors

### Known Issues & Limitations
- Contact form email requires Resend domain verification (sassystudio.com.mx)
- Dashboard requires admin authentication (no public API access)
- Blog images must be uploaded to Cloudinary (no direct file uploads)
- Locale switching refreshes page (client-side navigation not preserved)

## AI Assistant Interaction Guidelines

When assisting with this codebase:

1. **Respect the brand voice:** Use "alchemy" metaphor, sophisticated tone, avoid generic marketing language
2. **Prioritize bilingual context:** Always consider Spanish/English translations when editing content
3. **Maintain visual hierarchy:** Gold accents for luxury tier, pink for brand identity, noise texture for editorial feel
4. **Follow Next.js 16 patterns:** Server components by default, 'use client' only when needed, metadata export in layouts
5. **Optimize for performance:** Use Next.js Image, lazy loading, dynamic imports, avoid render-blocking scripts
6. **SEO consciousness:** Schema markup, semantic HTML, keyword-rich headings, internal linking
7. **Security first:** Never expose API keys, validate all inputs, maintain rate limiting on public endpoints

### Common Tasks

- **Adding a blog post:** Use dashboard /api/posts endpoint, requires authentication, TipTap editor for rich content
- **Updating services:** Edit messages/es.json and messages/en.json translation files, update ServiceCard components
- **Portfolio management:** Use /api/assets or dashboard Assets tab, Cloudinary integration required
- **Style changes:** Update app/globals.css for global styles, Tailwind classes for component-level styling
- **Translation updates:** Edit messages/*.json files, ensure key parity across es/en
